title: Filecoin Foundation explores space for decentralized storage system
description:
Filecoin Foundation president Marta Belcher explained that centralized architecture can face issues like files getting corrupted when in space.

At the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, Switzerland, Cointelegraph ambassador and editor-at-large Kristina Lucrezia Cornèr spoke with Filecoin Foundation president and chair Marta Belcher about the organization’s efforts to demonstrate the use of decentralized technologies in space communications. 

In addition, the executive also pointed out some issues with centralized architecture when facing radiation and space debris. Belcher explained that storing files in space is challenging because factors like radiation could corrupt the files. With a decentralized protocol, Belcher believes this wouldn’t be a problem as the files will be pulled from anywhere. “You can have lots of copies. And if one file gets corrupted, it doesn’t matter.”

Magazine: ThankYouX hits Sotheby’s as his career *literally* blasts into space: NFT Creator

title: Ripple CTO David Schwartz dispels myths around huge XRP transaction
description: In recent events, Ripple CTO David Schwartz has addressed concerns surrounding an unusually large transaction involving Ripple’s native cryptocurrency, XRP. The incident, initially causing alarm within the cryptocurrency community due to the reported value of nearly $15 billion, was later clarified by Schwartz as a gross misrepresentation of the figures involved. David Schwartz clarifies XRP […]

title: Trend Micro reveals new malware targeting crypto wallets on Windows
description: A new strain of info stealer Phemedrone Stealer appears to be targeting crypto wallets and messaging apps, analysts say. Cybersecurity firm Trend Micro recently uncovered a previously unknown malware strain, which was exploiting a now-patched security flaw in Microsoft Windows.…

title: Bitcoin supporter Ramaswamy quits US presidential race
description: Bitcoin (BTC) supporter Vivek Ramaswamy has officially dropped out of the race for the U.S. presidency. In a post on Jan. 16, Vivek Ramaswamy publicly endorsed Donald Trump’s candidacy, noting in his departure that the United States needs a patriot…

title: Close Gensler Ally Lobbies SEC Against Bitcoin ETF; Rising Appeal Seen for Hedera & Rebel Satoshi ($RBLZ) Among Investors
description: In the ever-evolving landscape of cryptocurrencies, recent events at the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) have sparked considerable interest among investors. A close ally of SEC Chair Gary Gensler has reportedly been lobbying against the approval of Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs). This development has prompted a shift in investor focus towards alternative options, notably Hedera [...]

title: Vanguard Shuns Bitcoin Futures: Financial Giant Withdraws from Crypto Market
description: Vanguard stands firm in distancing itself from the cryptocurrency space, refusing to offer both spot and futures Bitcoin ETFs on its platform. Vanguard’s stand aligns with its commitment to delivering a core set of traditional products and services for long-term investors. Vanguard, a major player in asset management, has opted to distance itself further from [...]

title: Crypto Community Reacts as TrueUSD (TUSD) Faces Stability Issues
description:
A trader and X user with the handle TheSkyhopper shared a dry remark on the risks of stablecoins with their followers today: “Crypto just isn’t right without an annual stablecoin depegging event or three.” The trigger for this post was TUSD’s recent price movement, which seemed to indicate a depegging from its 1:1 parity with […]
